name: Run Pelvis Run
description:
Iconic rock star Pelvis Lesley is on the run! Why is he running? To save his career! He has an upcoming comeback world tour which he has preparing for by practicing his melody while losing a pound or two. Beware life is not kind the Pelvis with loan sharks after him and 'mental' toilet blocks holding him back as well. Using the power ups Pelvis must travel the furthest distance while collecting notes and staying alive!

Disclaimer: I made this game for a 3D unreal assignment, all assets are not my own and have been found online. This is a non profit project.
